name: Tracker Hardware
body:
# Adjacent Reality
![Front of Tracker 0.2](http://adjacentreality.org/NodeHardware/images/front.png)
## Schematic and Board
The schematic and board were created in [Eagle CAD 6.0](http://www.cadsoftusa.com/) (I know, not open source, but we are pragmatists).
## Solid Models
Right now, in the SolidModels directory, there is just a basic enclosure for Tracker revision 0.2.  It is available in a parametric [OpenSCAD](http://www.openscad.org/) file and an STL that was generated from it.
tagline: Eagle CAD schematic and board and solid models for the Adjacent Reality Tracker
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
